creator: Style-7
descriptionHtml:
Analog clock as application, Live Wallpaper and widget. Clock displays month and day of the week according to current language. There are two types of appearance: solid and gradient style. Touch on the widget to run app.

Settings:

* Size of the clock and widget;
* Show second hand;
* Show the current date, month, day of the week, battery charge. Move a slot to desired place;
* Select primary, secondary, text and gradient colors;
* Gradient or solid color style;
* Change logo text;
* Align on the Home screen for Live Wallpaper;
* Time to speech by double tap and periodically;
* Keep screen on for app.
descriptionShort: Select colors and set unique analog clock as Live Wallpaper.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Hide hands for 3 seconds to show text on the dial by double tap as option (one tap for widget for the Home screen);
* Support multi-windows mode (split or pop up window);
* Common settings for all widgets on the Home screen (see item on the settings dialog);
* Minor changes.
Warning!
- Remove all app's widgets before update or restart your device;
- Discount for PRO version one week only from 2020.12.29 !

title: Analog Clock Live Wallpaper-7

creator: Style-7
descriptionHtml:
The first analog clock wallpaper on the Google Play Market since 2013!

This is an original analog clock. You can use it as application, Live Wallpaper and widget for the Home screen.

The clock displays also the current date, day of the week, month and battery charge. You can set your own logo text on the dial, select solid or gradient style, choose custom colors.

The clock can speak the current time by voice by double tap or periodically, for example by one hour. All settings of clock appearance set by visual control (as you see as you get).

The clock can be resized for Live Wallpaper. You can set any position on the Home screen, for example on the left right corner.

The clock widget can be resized too (use long touch). It is transparent so you can set it on your image wallpaper. You can set up a tap action for the widget: open this application or the built-in alarm clock. Hint: you can set several widgets on the Home screen.

Additional features of an analog clock.
* There is additional information on the dial: the day of the week, date, month and battery charge. You can hide any information or move it to any of fixed positions;
* The month and day of the week will be displayed by a language set by global settings, so, the clock is universal;
* You can hide the second hand;
* You can change text of the logo on the dial;
* There are two styles for the clock: solid and gradient. The gradient style uses two colors: the middle of the dial and the color of the bottom and top points of the dial. The clock hands are also displayed with a gradient. You can choose also color of the second hand and color of the text of additional information on the dial;
* There is an option "hide the second hand for 3 seconds by double tap". This is useful to comfortable read of additional information on the dial, for example, a month;
* You can set size of the clock and set any position of the Home screen for Live Wallpaper;
* The clock can speak the current time by voice by double tap or periodically, by: 1, 5, 15, 30 or 60 minutes.
* Attention, use one tap for widget instead double tap for all actions;
* There are special settings for the widget of the Home screen. You can show on the second hand but It will require slightly more battery charge. Set an action by tap on a widget: open this application, open the built-in alarm clock or do nothing;
* Keep screen on for application.

Frequently asked questions.

1. The app does not speak the current time.
Please open: "Settings - Time to speech - Help button" to install special app from Google or you can use any similar. Also use global setting of your device, for example "Settings - Language and input - Text to speech".

2. The widget stops or disappears sometimes.
Please open: "Settings - Settings for widget" and see instructions. Unfortunately this problem can not be fixed on some devices. Try also change the launcher then.

3. I can not set Live Wallpaper on the lock screen.
There is no legal solution for some devices. It is blocked by security system of device.
descriptionShort: Create unique analog clock by options and use as app, Live Wallpaper and widget

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Minor changes for some languages;
* Minor changes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Optimization for widget;
* Add widget on the Home screen from the main menu for Android 8 or high.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Speak time by schedule (see menu item).
--- Works even screen of device is off.
--- Just set check boxes for desired times. For example: 9.00, 10.00. 10.30, 11.45 etc.
--- Add any text (tap on list view item).
--- Set filter by days of week.
Warning! If screen is off then some devices has delay up to 6 minutes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Optimization for some devices.

title: Analog Clock Live Wallpaper-7

creator: Style-7
descriptionHtml:
The first analog clock wallpaper on the Google Play Market since 2013!

This is an original analog clock. You can use it as application, Live Wallpaper and widget for the Home screen.

The clock displays also the current date, day of the week, month and battery charge. You can set your own logo text on the dial, select solid or gradient style, choose custom colors.

The clock can speak the current time by voice by double tap or periodically, for example by one hour. All settings of clock appearance set by visual control (as you see as you get).

The clock can be resized for Live Wallpaper. You can set any position on the Home screen, for example on the left right corner.

The clock widget can be resized too (use long touch). It is transparent so you can set it on your image wallpaper. You can set up a tap action for the widget: open this application or the built-in alarm clock. Hint: you can set several widgets on the Home screen.

Additional features of an analog clock.
* There is additional information on the dial: the day of the week, date, month and battery charge. You can hide any information or move it to any of fixed positions;
* The month and day of the week will be displayed by a language set by global settings, so, the clock is universal;
* You can hide the second hand;
* You can change text of the logo on the dial;
* There are two styles for the clock: solid and gradient. The gradient style uses two colors: the middle of the dial and the color of the bottom and top points of the dial. The clock hands are also displayed with a gradient. You can choose also color of the second hand and color of the text of additional information on the dial;
* There is an option "hide the second hand for 3 seconds by double tap". This is useful to comfortable read of additional information on the dial, for example, a month;
* You can set size of the clock and set any position of the Home screen for Live Wallpaper;
* The clock can speak the current time by voice by double tap or periodically, by: 1, 5, 15, 30 or 60 minutes.
* Attention, use one tap for widget instead double tap for all actions;
* There are special settings for the widget of the Home screen. You can show on the second hand but It will require slightly more battery charge. Set an action by tap on a widget: open this application, open the built-in alarm clock or do nothing;
* Keep screen on for application.

Frequently asked questions.

1. The app does not speak the current time.
Please open: "Settings - Time to speech - Help button" to install special app from Google or you can use any similar. Also use global setting of your device, for example "Settings - Language and input - Text to speech".

2. The widget stops or disappears sometimes.
Please open: "Settings - Settings for widget" and see instructions. Unfortunately this problem can not be fixed on some devices. Try also change the launcher then.

3. I can not set Live Wallpaper on the lock screen.
There is no legal solution for some devices. It is blocked by security system of device.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Widget for Android 12
* Fixed bug for a custom time zone.

Standard widget (up to Android 11)
This widget recommended for Android 8-11 and has some restrictions:
- can not show second hand, battery charge;
- color of hands can be white or dark;
- widget has fixed sizes only.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Minor changes and improvements.
* Fixed minor bugs for app widgets (time zone).

title: Analog Clock Live Wallpaper-7

creator: Style-7
descriptionHtml:
Analog clock app since 2013.

It also displays the current date, month, day of the week, battery charge and digital clock. You can set visibility and position for them.

Set your own logo text on the dial.

Select primary, secondary, gradient and text colors.

Select an image from Gallery and set it for background.

Use analog clock as App widget. The clock shows second hand for Android 12+. Use standard way for resize a widget. Select a time zone for Android 12+.

Use analog clock as Live Wallpaper. Set clock size and position on the Home screen.

Use analog clock by full screen mode with keeping screen on.

Use list of reminders. The clock will talk time and any additional text.

Use double tap on the app or Live Wallpaper for talk the current time.

So this app is: analog clock, analog clock widget, analog clock live wallpaper, talking analog clock, clock widget with second hand,, transparent analog clock.
descriptionShort: Transparent analog clock as app, Live Wallpaper, app widget. Talking reminder.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Minor changes for app widget.
Minor changes for Live Wallpaper.
New feature: open inbuilt alarm by Quick Settings tile.
Other minor changes and improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Minor changes.

title: Analog Clock Live Wallpaper-7

creator: Style-7
descriptionHtml:
App on the market place since 2013.

Set set your own logo text for the clock, choose a gradient or solid style, use your own colors: primary, secondary, text color and gradient color.

The analog clock also shows: the current date, day of the week, month and battery charge (except for the app widget).

The analog clock can tell you the current time by voice by double tap on the app window or Live Wallpaper.

Use the list of reminders and the clock will talk the current time and any text according to the schedule, which is very convenient for work and leisure.

Use analog clock as Live Wallpaper: set the clock size and position on the screen.

Use the analog clock as an app widget: it shows the second hand for Android 12 or high.

Use the analog clock as app in full screen mode with "keep screen on" option.

Select an image from the Gallery for the background.

Set the position to display the date, month, day of the week and battery charge.

Open the built-in alarm clock by the quick settings panel.

The app supports landscape and portrait orientation, all screen resolutions, as well as 4K and HD displays.

The application supports all languages and time and date formats.

So this application is: analog clock. analog clock Live Wallpaper, analog clock widget, transparent analog clock, clock widget with second hand, talking clock, voice notifications, clock reminder.
descriptionShort: Transparent analog clock app, Live Wallpaper, app widget

* Fixed bug for option "keep screen on" (after restart the app).
* Fixed minor bugs.
* Some minor changes.

Use the list of reminders and the clock will talk the current time and any text according to the schedule, which is very convenient for work and leisure.

Use the analog clock as topmost or overlay clock. The clock will be set above all windows. You can change position of the clock by drag and drop method and size of the clock.

Use analog clock as Live Wallpaper: set the clock size and position on the screen.

Use the analog clock as an app widget: it shows the second hand for Android 12 or high. Also the clock shows seconds for digital clock as option,

Use the analog clock as app in full screen mode with "keep screen on" option. You can add the second launcher for quick start in fullscreen mode.

Select an image from the Gallery for the background.

Set the position to display the date, month, day of the week and battery charge.

Open the built-in alarm clock by the quick settings panel.

The app supports landscape and portrait orientation, all screen resolutions, as well as 4K and HD displays.

The application supports all languages and time and date formats.

So this application is: analog clock. analog clock Live Wallpaper, analog clock widget, transparent analog clock, clock widget with second hand, talking clock, voice notifications, clock reminder.
descriptionShort: Transparent analog clock app, Live Wallpaper, app widget

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Option "keep screen on" is removed. App in fullscreen mode always will run with "keep screen on";
* New group in the main menu "Set clock as ...";
* Minor changes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Show the current year on the bottom of a clock dial as option. For change: Settings - Show.
* App shortcuts: Fullscreen, Voice notifications, Settings (Android 8+). Use long touch on the app icon for show menu with app shortcuts. Hint: you can put an app shortcut on the Home screen by 'drag and drop'.
* Minor changes.
